game.name: Cats in Wonderland
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Queen of Hearts had a fit of rage after the Cheshire Cat refused to be her pet and ordered the capture of all the cats in Wonderland. Find them before her and prevent anything bad from happening.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Queen of Hearts had a fit of rage after the Cheshire Cat refused to be her pet and ordered the capture of all the cats in Wonderland. Find them before her and prevent anything bad from happening.
